dct_description_sm: Shapefile representing significant roads in Africa during the 1980s. Data were extracted from Michelin Africa maps published that decade and drawn at a scale of 1:4,000,000. For more detailed information on this dataset's production, please refer to the "supplemental information" portion of this record.
dct_creator_sm: Map and Geospatial Information Center, Lewis Library, Princeton University
